TC-001.DESCRIPTION:
Feature: Home Page

Scenario: Verify home page elements

Given I am in the Home page
Then I should see the elements loaded in the page, #elements

TC-002.DESCRIPTION:
Feature: Header

Scenario: Verify header is always present

Given I am in any page of the website
Then the header should always be visible

TC-003.DESCRIPTION:
Feature: Search bar

Scenario: Can use search bar to look for products

Given I am in any page of the website
When I type a keyword or keywords in the search bar
And click the Search button
Then I should be navigated to the search result page

TC-004.DESCRIPTION:
Feature: Search bar

Scenario: Can filter search by categories

Given I am in any page of the website
When I click on the All Categories dropdown in the search bar
Then I should be able to see the categories to filter my search with, #categories

TC-005.DESCRIPTION:
Feature: Navigation

Scenario: Header should contain a navigation section

Given I am in any page of the website
Then I should be able to see the navigation section, #navigation

TC-006.DESCRIPTION:
Feature: Navigation

Scenario: Clicking Shop by Category should show categories

Given I am in any page of the website
When I click the Shop by Category element in the header
Then a list of categories should pop up from the left of the screen

TC-007.DESCRIPTION:
Feature: Register Account

Scenario: Must be able to create an account

Given I am in Register account page
When I fill the necessary input fields with details
And I click the Continue button
Then I should see that my account has been created successfully

TC-008.DESCRIPTION:
Feature: Register Account

Scenario: Register account input fields must be validated

Given I am in Register account page
When I click the Continue button
But I did not fill the necessary input fields with details
Then I should not be navigated to a success page
And I should see that the missing fields have validation messages in them

TC-009.DESCRIPTION:
Feature: Login

Scenario Outline: Must be able to log in to a registered account

Given I am in Login page
When I fill the input fields with the correct <email> and <password>
And I click the Login button
Then I should be logged in and navigated to My Account page

TC-010.DESCRIPTION:
Feature: Login

Scenario Outline: Must not be logged in with incorrect credentials

Given I am in Login page
When I fill the input fields with invalid <email> and <password>
And I click the Login button
Then I should not be logged in and see an error message

TC-011.DESCRIPTION:
Feature: My Account Page

Background: Logged in
Given I am logged in to my account

Scenario: Verify My Account page elements

Given I am in My Account page
Then I should see the elements loaded in the page, #elements

TC-012.DESCRIPTION:
Feature: My Account Page

Scenario: Cannot access My Account if not logged in

Given I am in any page of the website
But I am not logged in
When I try to access My Account via url, #url
Then I should be navigated to the Login page

TC-013.DESCRIPTION:
Feature: Product Search

Scenario: Verify search result page elements

Given I am in any page of the website
When I search for a product using the search bar
And I am navigated to the search result page
Then I should see the elements loaded in the page, #elements

TC-014.DESCRIPTION:
Feature: Product Search

Scenario: Hovering on a product in search result page shows actions for the product

Given I am in search result page
When I hover my pointer to a product on the list
Then I should be able to see actions that I can do for the product, #actions

TC-015.DESCRIPTION:
Feature: Product Search

Scenario: Clicking on a product should take me to the product's page

Given I am in search result page
When I click on a product in the list
Then I should be navigated to the product's page

TC-016.DESCRIPTION:
Feature: Product Page

Scenario: Verify product page elements

Given I am in a product page
Then I should see the elements loaded in the page, #elements
